greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(a(n-1)/2) if this is positive and not yet in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = 10*a(n-1).
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Rest@Nest[Append[#, If[MemberQ[#, c = Quotient[#[[-1]], 2]], 10*#[[-1]], c]] &, {0, 1}, 54] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Sep 06 2015 *)
program: (PARI) first(n)=my(v=vector(n), t); v[1]=1; for(i=2, n, t=v[i-1]\2; if(t<2, v[i]=10*v[i-1]; next); for(j=1, i-1, if(v[j]==t, v[i]=10*v[i-1]; next(2))); v[i]=t); v \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 31 2016
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
